alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 15 at 10:09AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Brevard. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1007 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Indialantic, West Melbourne, Indian Harbour Beach, Melbourne Beach, Melbourne Village, Eau Gallie and June Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
